thread.title: It's confirmed! 'Sarabhai vs Sarabhai' to return as a web series - Entertainment
thread.title_full: It's confirmed! 'Sarabhai vs Sarabhai' to return as a web series - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: It's confirmed! 'Sarabhai vs Sarabhai' to return as a web series - Entertainment
text:
A still from Sarabhai vs Sarabhai; (inset) Deven Bhojani 
Director-actor Deven Bhojani, who helmed hit comedy television show Sarabhai vs Sarabhai, revealed that he had plans to turn the sitcom into a feature film.
The show, which aired in the mid-2000, featured Satish Shah, Ratna Pathak Shah, Sumeet Raghavan, Rupali Ganguly and Rajesh Kumar. Deven said though there were discussions with the makers to turn the show into a film, but they had to shelve the idea eventually.
"We had a couple of rounds of discussion with our writer and producer regarding this. But then it didn't work out the way we wanted to, so we thought to do something else with it," Deven told PTI.
The show became extremely popular for an unconventional take on saas-bahu nok jhok.
Sarabhai vs Sarabhai is now set to return as a web series and Deven says some new characters will be added.
"We will take a time leap and retain a few qualities and of course, all the successful characters. We add a couple of more new characters. It is going to come out very soon," said Deven, who is gearing up for his directorial debut, Commando 2.
